614180.name: Istrolid - Curves and Shadows
614180.description:
Design the sleekest aerodynamic ships or make your armor pop with Curves and Shadows.
This is our second set of cosmetic upgrades for players who want to help support development of the game. It includes a range of new armors, such as heavyweight armor with angular shadows, curved parts for volumetric and heavyweight, and new lightweight corner pieces. It also comes with a selection of new diagonal stripes and small decals to paint your ship with. With sleek curves and new detailing everyone will notice when your ships jump onto the field.

Anyone who supports us by buying a DLC also gets bonus features, including the ability name and search their ship list, and to rotate all armor pieces and wings!
